game.beginning: A young hero embarks on a quest to save the kingdom from an evil sorcerer who has unleashed darkness upon the land.
game.ending: After several challenges and battles, the hero ultimately defeats the sorcerer and restores peace and light back to the kingdom.
game.synopsis: In this epic adventure game, players control a young hero who must journey through treacherous lands, encounter mythical creatures, solve puzzles, and defeat formidable enemies in order to save the kingdom from darkness.
game.title: The Quest for Light
